page.title: 09JOBS & EMPLOYMENT
page.content: IN OUR AREA THERE ARE ONLY 7 BUSINESSES , GIVING ONLY 86 JOBS. SO MOST PEOPLE HAVE TO TRAVEL OUT OF OUR AREA TO GET WORK . IN PENTRE SCHOOL THERE ARE 16 FAMLIES AND THE ADULTS IN THOSE FAMILIES TRAVEL AT LEAST 20 MILES A DAY TO AND FROM WORK.SO THEY HAVE TO HAVE A CAR BECAUSE PUBLIC TRANSPORT IS TERRIBLE. FOR EXAMPLE THERE IS NO BUS THAT GOES DIRECT FROM BLACK PARK,WHERE A LOT OF PEPOLE LIVE,TO WREXHAM , WHERE A LOT OF PEOPLE WORK. THERE IS A LOT OF UNEMPLOYMENT IN OUR AREA .OF ALL 16 FATHERS IN OUR CLASS 5 ARE UNEMPLOYED .THE OTHER JOBS ARE FARMER, CARPENTER , INVENTOR ,TEACHER ,POLICEMAN,FACTORY WORKER, ANIMAL LABORATORY TECHNICIAN.
